body:
i'm thankful for this rhye cover of "[a whiter shade of pale](https://open.spotify.com/track/6AcYLHkLDFn6qcZiPS6xNc)", which is fresh clean sheets.

i'm thankful for these weird fancy japanese chocolates that d got us that taste uncannily like barbecue. i'm thankful for [this tom petty song](https://open.spotify.com/album/073bHtlHVYA30LOv7cyk3V), which is miller high life in the park.

i'm thankful that when we went for a walk today, at one of the junctions in the trail, there was a man processing a tree through a wood chipper. i'm thankful for wood chippers, which, like paper shredders, are fascinating because you can see how the material is different when it becomes output from what it is as input. i'm thankful for the spray of unmaking.

i'm thankful for this song by [pinkcaravan!](https://open.spotify.com/track/68f3IfTHC36rhNH0V6nNk3), which is various haribo.

i'm thankful that after deleting the twitter app on my phone so i could "unplug," i had the thought that watching instagram stories without the sound on is like sex with a condom, which felt important enough that i reinstalled the app and got the password from my password manager to log in so i could post it, which then made me feel weird.

i'm thankful for [this weird old computer game written by timothy leary](https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2018/07/13/diy-transcendence-with-timothy-learys-mind-mirror/#more-565883). i'm thankful for [what bjork thinks is techno](https://twitter.com/rosa___jones/status/1017394230711521280). i'm thankful for [this tapestry of the voyager record](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YQWiYSBDOEs).

i'm thankful to [not scare the ice cream](https://twitter.com/fakeirl).
